pullRequest.title: HDDS-3734. Improve the performance of SCM with 3.86% by avoid TreeSet.addAll
pullRequest.bodyText:
What changes were proposed in this pull request?
I start a ozone cluster with 1000 datanodes, and run two weeks with heavy workload, and perf scm.
TreeSet.addAll cost 3.86% cpu because of so many datanodes.
we need not TreeSet.addAll, because the DatanodeDetails was got from NodeStateMap::ConcurrentHashMap<NodeState, Set> stateMap, the value type of stateMap is a set, so there is no duplicate DatanodeDetails. we can replace TreeSet.addAll with list.addAll

What is the link to the Apache JIRA
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HDDS-3734
How was this patch tested?
Existed UT and IT.

commit.message: HDDS-3734. Improve the performance of SCM with 3.86% by avoid TreeSet.addAll

nodes.bodyText: I think returnList is no longer needed, tmp can be returned from here directly.
